comment._content:
The (now) Old Nassau County Courthouse (built: 1902) on Old Country Road in Mineola.  Here it is today with far smaller trees and no more ivy:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/josepha/2486507985/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: TVL 1970: Thanks for identifying the full name of this building.  We will add it to the image description.
